Client Self Service

It takes a glance at your smartphone to know what the day holds for you. wellhest makes managing and modifying schedules for both individual calenders and whole business.

Client/Booking Management

Know the details of every booking, every detail information like time of service, booking, No turn up, Appointment reminder, Accept/Reject the Service.

Point of Sale

Various mode of online payment and cash at delivery point to make check out faster and easier than ever. Introducing a cancellation policy to discourage no turn up.

Business and Finance Management

Manage your finance at a click. Get Notifications for week's business. Get report on sales just with a click as well as manage your staff and inventories.
